values:
People need to back off.
You commented to be "cool" and be all "OH JIMMY LIKES CAYLEIGH"
That's nice.

I can post all the song lyrics I would like too. your comments are not going to effect me what-so-ever.

I dont even know why I wrote back. because I could care less.

These girls on the T.V turned like anorexic.
Eh. that is baddddddd. and they are happy.
terrible.

just wait.

Whatttttttt. LJ wont let me do cuts at my dads?
That's just snappy.
Yes. snappy.
I'm at my moms again

I slept at KaSondra's house last night. We watched the MTV all night but I forgot the name. but the actor, Sean. SO hot.
Yes, yes. We ate junk food. a lot. blah.

My grandparents came for a visit. then I cleaned my room. now I'm here.

I'm listening to Don Henely and like. all these oldies I used to love.

Why are people complaining, about what I write in my journal. If I feel like using my journal to vent, than oh my god. I will. so shut up thanks.

My mom said this thing that I thought was worthy of the journal. but nooooo. cant remember. f-i-g-u-r-e-s. 
And a song wont work at my moms house. SO NOT COOL.
Notice the SO.
Yep.

I have the music my mom hates on now. I love it.
LATER.

"If you can honestly look at me, and tell you do not love me anymore. Then I will leave you alone"
Best movie quote of the week.

And you don't seem to understand
A shame you seemed an honest man
And all the fears you hold so dear
Will turn to whisper in your ear
And you know what they say might hurt you
And you know that it means so much
And you don't even feel a thing

I am falling, I am fading,
I have lost it all

And you don't seem the lying kind
A shame that I can read your mind
And all the things that I read there
Candle-lit smile that we both share
And you know I don't mean to hurt you
But you know that it means so much
And you don't even feel a thing

I am falling, I am fading, I am drowning,
Help me to breathe
I am hurting, I have lost it all
I am losing
Help me to breathe

I spend my nights dead face down on my floor
but the drugs aren't really working anymore
the nights are mostly just depressed
from staring at my open chest
I'm bleeding and I'm heartless but I'm yours
and I'm scratching down every blurry scene
on the mattress where you used to sleep and dream
I'd rather chew on broken glass
than keep on living in the past
and wasting time on words I know you didn't mean

Dear everybody or whoever's listening
I think I'm gonna do me in this time
this is all overrated
waiting on my roof again this is the end
of my so called life

I haven't seen the sun in about a week
and I'm keeping all sharp objects out of reach
I finally know the taste of love
it's a cross between cheap beer and blood
with an aftertaste of dry sarcastic speech
and so I guess it's safe to say
that we both knew that I'd end up this way
with a brain that's clueless and unsure
and eyes that hardly ever work but I guess that's fine I rarely use them anyway

Dear everybody or whoever's listening
I think I'm gonna do me in this time
this is all overrated
waiting on my roof again this is the end
of my so called life

Dear everybody or whoever's listening
I think I'm gonna do me in this time
this is all overrated
waiting on my roof again this is the end
of my so called life

Lj is being gay. whatever.

I might delete my journal.
It reminds me of things I cant go back too.
And it depresses me more than I need to be.

I dont know. what is going on with him. IT's just. so confusing.
I STILL care. sadly. and i will. for a very long time.
I keep trying. I do. but nothing works. I cant forget him.
People mess up. SO what. i made a mistake. a few of them. i am admitting that to you.

Whatever. I'm still trying. I cant figure out why, but I am.

I'm sick.
Coughing
Sore throat.
Probably a fever.
Stuffy nose.
Whole bit. and I went to practice today and warmed up then sat the rest of practice. Molly was glad I went she said it showed team commitment or something.
I feel pretty sick right now.

I know why I'm getting sick.
IT SUCKS
I cant sleep much anymore.
And I just want to. forget anything going on.
I'm glad I have Amber to talk to. she makes the day not so terrible.
Thank you Amber. the bus

AND STEPHANIE. THE STICK! hahahahaha best night talking to you. its all that cheered me up.
Besides Kraig and Andy being weird.
That was fun.
Andy said we're soul mates. we like the same dunkin donut stuff.

I should go to bed instead of keeping up a pretty bad update....
I had really good song lyrics i wanted up. but lj is being stupid.

Screw. this.
Bye

oh baby. I'm posting some lyrics soon for songs. the bold is for the parts that are TOWARDS someone. and then they rest in all "sajkdfghfdg"

My ankle is bad again. I couldnt walk up the stairs. It was so bad. i cried for like 2 seconds cuz it hurt. then limped my way back to class. i ran into Jimmy on accident, I was dazed and out of it.

I was in metal a lot for the newspaper. Cernak is my homeboy. and Kraig and Andy and everyone is all "WHOA" and talk to me. I got to sit on the SPECIAL stool. Cernaks stool. because my ankle was being stupid. so Kraig made me sit down. Then. told cassie i wasn't going to practice. and yeah.

on the phone with Kraig. venting back and forth. hang on

"I Don't Wanna Know"

i don't wanna know
i don't wanna know

your eyes were covered in sunglasses
when they first met mine
i sat there and stared at you
you didn't seem to mind
the awkward ways we meet

first comes heavy breathing
staring at the ceiling
what will happen next
i don't wanna know
i don't wanna know

i never cared how i dressed before
but i cared that night
anticipation ran through my bones
and my clothes never fit right
i can't wait til we meet again

first comes heavy breathing
staring at the ceiling
what will happen next
i don't wanna know
i don't wanna know

framed pictures start to be put on the walls
constant visits while i'm out on the road
its hard to leave sometimes
but you know where i lay my head at night

first comes heavy breathing
staring at the ceiling
what will happen next
i don't wanna know
i don't wanna know

my ankle is shot. we were running sprints, and i had hurt it before. and kasondra ran infront of my on accident, and hit me and it twisted and i fell and i am limping. i couldnt play for like an hour. i just sat there. it hurt SO bad

KASONDRA TIFFANY. IT WAS NOT YOUR FAULT. ACCIDENTS HAPPEN. I WILL FINE.

One of the coaches told me to keep it unwrapped when i sleep, but to keep it wrapped when i'm in school

I MADE THE JV TEAM THOUGH. that's what i wanted all along.
I cant wait.
First practice: tomorrow. 3:30. i neeeeed to call me faja but my mom is talking away on the tele.

i made renaisance at school too? high honors? SCARY.
I guess some things are turning around for the better.

I think people need to lay of Jimmy. I mean it. he did NOTHING to you. what happens with us, is OUR business. i may get sad, or upset. but dont spread dumb rumors k thanks. so please just leave him alone.

KRAIG SAID HE'D GO TO ALL MY GAMES CUZ I ROCK! oh yes

I'm feeling a little better.
WE ran A LOT today.
It's ok.

KaSondra played pool with me today.
OH YES.

I'm glad I can talk to you again. it means a lot to me :)  (NOT ABOUT KASONDRA. BUT I STILL LOVE HER)


k. moral of story: ankles suck, people suck, kasondra rules, kraig rocks, people give jimmy to much bad attention. k thanks

"your mother is so crafty" she's a genius.

Yes she is.

Aly is so better calling me later.
That made no sense.
My head hurts.

TODAY: I had a headache and Sparks visited me LAST night.
I went to the nurse during french and she told me to come back. well i got to math. and i was dizzy and i had my head down and Amanda and Sarah got freaked. cuz i was shaking really bad and i told Caswell I thought i'd faint. he walked me to the nurse. She gave me crackers, and water and sent me back to class. Amber made Jimmy move so she could sit behind me. then i find out jimmy thought it was FUNNY how i was sick. ass hole.
THENNNNN. Amber walked me to lunch and held onto my arm. then i didnt eat much since i didnt feel good. Tim walked with me back up to class. I got even dizzier and couldnt sit up in my seat. and i couldnt talk my head hurt so bad. mr. caswell called the nurse and said i need to go down there right away and i needed a wheelchair or something. amber and stephanie started walking me one on each side, then the floor started spinning and i just sat down. i couldnt move. amber ran to get the nurse and steph stayed with me. the nurse showed up, put me in a wheelchair, then brought me to her room. she called my mom and i layed down. she said i shook like a leaf? my mom came. i went home and slept. the nurse told miller i cant tryout tonight. so hopefully i can still play :(

I am so mad at Jimmy. WHY WOULD YOU LAUGH? it's not even funny. that's so stupid.
Grrr. I am like starting to hate him so much.

Must go. OH AND TIM CALLED ME AND GAVE ME THE HOMEWORK SINCE HE IS NICE AND DOESNT LAUGH AT PEOPLE WHEN THEY DONT FEEL WELL. he asked me if i was ok a lot today :) he's a good friend. haha

BYE

Kristy made my layout as a surprise guys!
:)
I was all "OK DO THE KEY AND THE LOCK AND YEAH BUT YOU CAN DESIGN IT" and i picked my icon and told her the colors.
And she did the rest
and i love it.
So there. shove it
:)

SOCCER GAME. i think i might start playing indoor soccer.
It was fun to watch.
And I really like it. so if i play, i have a game tomorrow! :)

GO ME.

Kristy and I stayed up, watched movies, that whole bit.

i also made a new sn for no reason at all "xyourxbeautifulx" :)


I HOPE KRISTY AND I HANG OUT TONIGHT SINCE I LOVE HER SO THERE. bye

I'm at Kristys.
And she is all "UPDATE"
And we're changing my layout some day.
and a new icon.

OH AND PEOPLE NEED TO SHUT THEIR MOUTHES!
Stop spreading rumors about Jimmy to me. and stop spreading rumors about Me. to Jimmy
Frankly, I dont care what you have to say anymore. It wont change how I look at him.

We went to the ice rink today. Kristy and I. OH BOY! :)
Secrets secrets.
I'm sleeping here then going to her soccer game. then going home and doing who knows what with who knows who

My ear itches. :)
I itched it/

WHOEVER STARTED THAT RUMOR ABOUT KRISTY AND AUSTIN GOING OUT NEEDS TO SHUT UP. WHERE DO PEOPLE MAKE THIS STUFF UP FROM? DO YOU JUST PULL IT OUT OF THE TOP OF YOUR HEAD?

Do they think that it makes them better to spread rumors? the NEXT person who brings a rumor to my attention, will be hated. where do you get off making stupid things up, or even bothering me with your patheticness?
GROW UP.



That is that.


Kristy is hotter than your dog. or your cat. or your fish! and if you have none of those. then you suck at life. not really but ya suck.

This was longer than expected and Kristy is giggling at everything i write? CRAZY

STOP LYING. AND MAKING IT UP. YOU'RE LITTLE "FRIEND" JUST GAVE IT AWAY. he blew your cover!

And her journal is friends only loves. ya cant read it.

Pfcha. only I can. i'm deleting all her friendsbut like me.

YEAH GOODBYE LOSERS.

I havent updated.
Oh well.

Today is thanksgiving. the family is coming over. I'm at my dads.

SCHOOL>>lets not go there. you would know if you were IN my school. and see me ALL the time. so there.

MY DAD IS CRAZIER THAN...YOUR MOM.

....that was so weird man

I dont know.
I had a lot to write again
But now I dont.
And I dont feel like updating still/
Bye/

How about no.
I dont feel like updating, so why am I?
Had a DETENTION today. 10 minutes. who gives out 10 minute detentions? CASWELL MAN.

I want to be a SUPERHERO! with a cape. and a cool name like "CAPE WOMAN" I think Sparks is right. They drove me nuts-o.

My cat has an obsession with me.
She never leaves me alone?
She's all "OH I LOVE YOU STEPHANIE. PET ME. PURRR PET ME" And I'm all "GAHAHAHA GO AWAY BEFORE I EAT YOU"

:)

I have problems.
DID YOU NOTICE I WAS AFRAID?
I THOUGHT I'D RUN OUT OF THINGS TO SAY.

OK. I'LL STOP. OR NOT. EITHER OR, IT'S TOO BAD FOR YOU

Oh you love me. and my weirdness

On 7th heaven, they have wayyyyyy to many doors. they have like 2 in their kitchen. and like 4 more man.
TOOO MANNYYY IF YOU ASK ME.


OK OK OK GOODBYE

I feel the need to update AGAIN.
Oh be quiet you love it.

I hate how fake people are. like, they sit there and tell y ou to your face "OH MY GOD I LOVE YOU" but then turn around and just talk. I hate that I dont trust people anymore. I hate how people tell me lies about things that never happened. I dont like that I vent so much. I dont like that my mom and me stopped getting along. I hate that I cant talk to her anymore because i dont think she'd get it. I dont like this new computer. I hate that I am always dumped on. I dont like how I always try to make everyones problems better, when I should focus on my own. I dont like my self-esteem, I dont like anonymous posters that say mean things. I dont like that I care so much, and he doesnt know it. That one I can't help. I like him, but eh. it's complicated. 

I dont like how people just, dont get it at times. I dont like how rumors are spread. I just dont like the fact that I am not sleeping.

Why did I write this? because I'm hoping it will take some of my stress off. because I'm sick of acting like I care about things, when I could care less. OR that I care less about things, when it's all I think about it.

I think I should go talk to my mom. i dont know about. just. maybe everything. maybe just cry.
I need to do that soon. I havent.

We have a new computer.
Too bad my step dad set it up so I cant have AIM.
And I cant download anything.
Whats the point in this stupid thing anyway then?
SO MY PARENTS CAN USE IT.

Whatever.
That's stupid.
I'll talk to you guys when I go to my dads.
I'm going tonight.

Also going ice skating.
Blah. I havent skated in quite a bit!
I might fall :(

It records everything I type.
I'm not trusted.
I dont do drugs, I dont drink, I dont have sex.
Except with like Mary! :)
They must hate me.

Oh well.
I'll just update this thing.

"Inside Out"

Here. A little sympathy for you to waste on me
I know you're faking it but that's okay
And I don't want to drag it out
Don't want to bring you down
I never wanted it to end this way

Even if I wanted to
I don't think that I'd get to you
There's nothing I can say to you to make you feel alive again

Here. A little jealousy
I hope you think of me
Hope you wonder where I sleep at night (sleep at night)
Cause I feel like I'm inside out
You got me upside down
Maybe I was holding on too tight

Even if I wanted to 
I don't think that I'd get to you
There's nothing I can say to you to make you feel alive again

So don't just say goodbye to me
Just turn your back away and leave
And if you're lucky I will be your last regret, your only friend

The two of us we dream like one
The two of us, the two of us
The two of us take breath like one
The two of us, the two of us
[x2]

I guess that this is over now
I guess it's called the falling out
But everyday I'm learning how to make it through this life I'm in

Even if I wanted to
I don't think that I'd get to you
There's nothing I can say to you to make you feel alive again

So don't just say goodbye to me
Just turn your back away and leave
And if you're lucky I will be your last regret, your only friend

I was at my dads last night.

It was fun. we went shopping and I bought jeans, 3 shirts, and PJs.

Bought pizza, played Keno! won a dollar man! hahaha then hung out and fell asleep early.

Woke up, hung out, walked to the store, walked to another store, SAW FIRETRUCKS BY MY STREEEEET. Gave my dog a bath, cleaned the bathroom, cleaned my room. OH MY GOD THE BATHROOM CASSIE! WE WERE SOAKING WET. shut up. we had like. a water fight.

NOW I'M HERE AND IF I GET TICKLED ONE MORE TIME I'LL SNAP.

Where have I been?
Tsk tsk.
Jeff shall be mad.
EVEN THOUGH HIS MOUSE BUSTED SO HE CANT READ IT :) ha.

Wednesday night: My dad decided it was too cold for me to be outside? uh k.
So I walk into his room to say hello and he goes "I'M OVER HERE! CAN YOU SEE ME? ARE YOU BLIND YET?" so I ran and attacked him. that was fun. i havent done that since i was like. 6! Then I went upstairs. and he came up and we talked. and he fixed my heater and i told him his fat butt was in the way of my t.v! well it was....
Then Rach came up and we went to war. hahahaha TICKLE WARS. and pinching, and kicking? and hahahahaaa. I THREW HER OFF MY BED. GO ME. then we ran downstairs. and i slipped across the floor.

Thursday: BEST DAY. hung out with Kristy. got picked up around like 10 and then we went to the MOVIES. and hahahahaha we talked the whole time! it was so fun though. we went to the store and got COOKIE MIX. and went back to kristys house and MADE COOKIES. and found the best website. which i cant tell you. then they brought me home. and here i am!

Friday: kind of boring actually. in school. IT SNOWED. so happy. i hate the cold but i loveeee snow.
After school: KaSondra and I worked things out and i guess there might be another girls night tonight? at my dads? YAY MAN.
That night: JIMMY DECIDED TO COME OVER. even though i'd rather gone to the misfits. pft. just kidding. That was fun. we went outside and he threw a snowball at me! *jaw drops* hahaa. i threw one back :) then we chased my dog. and jimmy slipped and i couldnt stop laughing..KIND OF LIKE IN SCHOOL WHEN PEOPLE FALL OFF BUSES. AND FAKED BEING HURT BECAUSE THEY WERE FINE LAST NIGHT. OH. die.  

on with my story. ok so then we came back. and watched PETER PAN. i think. that may have been before? and we both started falling asleep. i like sleeping on him. hahaha then he cant move.
Then we brought him home.

I GOT MY GLASSES NOW TOOO. jimmy told on me because i took them off and he's mean. <33

LETS SEE. today: MALL? sleeping at my dads? I'M CONFUSED GUYS.

SO HAPPY.
and excited.

I GET TO HANG OUT WITH MY BEST FRIEND (not jeff) KRISTY, TOMORROW!

I cant wait.
We're going to the movies and we decided to bake MORE cookies! HHAHAHA WE CAN COOK THAT NOW :)
I havent hung out with Kristy since like my birthday so this should be a ton of fun.

Today was ok. Kinda sad untill Kristy told me we're hanging out. then i was like "OH MY" and hyper all day.

Steph and i had some fun "I DARE YOU. TOUCH IT" ahhahahaha

Then Cayleigh on the bus "IT VIBRATED ON MY SIDE" ha. a litttttle loud

OK. I really care about Jimmy. and I hope he knows that. He's one of those SO GOOD things that happened to me. of that made sense?
he makes me laugh and happy. and i hope nothing happens and nothing goes wrong. because i care about him way to much.

I CANT WAIT FOR TOMORRRRROW.
K. bye.

Alright.
Jeff EVEN COMMENTED for an update.

Yesterday I went to the eye doctors. I have to wear glasses all the time now for distance.
and reading.

Welll. I also might have this eye disease, Glacouma. my doctor thinks i have it. the nerves in my eyes are messed up and the theres a lot of pressure on my eyes.
I also guess my side vision is off again.
Wow.

I could go blind. Well, last time I knew Glacouma caused blindess too. unless I get the surgery. because I guess there is a surgery? or eye drops too. 1 in 10,000 kids my age get it.
That sucks.

I want Jeff to be there, and he said he would go. but I'm not sure I want him there because in a way, I dont want to be around my best friend if i do have it.

Last night was rough. Went to the mall and bought a coat with KaSondra. that cheered me up. but my whole family is all *iudgdfsG* then we had a snow owl in the back yard.
it was really pretty.

Havent been sleeping well again.
Theres a lot on my mind.
The only things going right are Jimmy, my friends, my best friends, and part of my family.

Pretty upset with my dad, he said he'd call me and he never did. nice to know he cares THAT much.

I think I should go....
I'll write about today, later.
